body:
hello there lol players

my name is albert and i recently downloaded this amazing game.

i joined the server yesterday as my profile shows. 

i hope to see you in game!

i hope i dont get banned. i think my aim is really good and my good friend cirE (sdrawkcab) told me that people get unjustly banned for aim assist. it's really sad. i also hate ghost client. screenshare me if u like. even if i do get caught i can appeal in 2 months anyway XD.
